ComicInfo.Title: Hyperbreed Part 2: Against the Odds
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids: Hyperbreed
ComicInfo.Summary: Byrr, Fext, and Cammo spacefold into an asteroid field, are nearly crushed by rapidly growing Yik crystals, flee their infected freighter and certain death in a tiny escape craft built for one, and find temporary refuge on Rotgut Station. There they stumble on one tiny ray of hope for survival, a peculiar little renegade "splice" called Boomer, and learn that they never really left their true enemies behind.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:48:02. [CVDB772890] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:26:53. [Issue ID 2567141]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Dorian Sr.,Guy Dorian,Guy Dorian Sr.
ComicInfo.Inker: Sal Buscema,Scott Hanna,Guy Dorian,Sal Buscema,Scott Hanna
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Young Adult, Suggested Ages 12 and Older
